setDefaultEncoding(Charset) - Static method in class org.netbeans.api.queries.FileEncodingQuery
Sets the encoding which should be used for newly created projects.
SharabilityQuery - Class in org.netbeans.api.queries
Determine whether files should be shared (for example in a VCS) or are intended to be unshared.
SharabilityQuery.Sharability - Enum in org.netbeans.api.queries
Sharability constants.
SharabilityQueryImplementation - Interface in org.netbeans.spi.queries
Deprecated.
Use SharabilityQueryImplementation2 instead.
SharabilityQueryImplementation2 - Interface in org.netbeans.spi.queries
Determine whether files should be shared (for example in a VCS) or are intended to be unshared.
SHARABLE - Static variable in class org.netbeans.api.queries.SharabilityQuery
Deprecated.
Use SharabilityQuery.Sharability.SHARABLE instead.
